block.p: RABKIN--Gerry, 76, died June 12th, 2007 in Manhattan. Lifelong New Yorker, Gerry was beloved father of Masha. Beloved friend/trusted Editor of Diane. Professor, Director, Parodist and Actor, performing in the First Paris English Language Production of ''Waiting for Godot''. Author of ''Drama and Commitment'' and ''Richard Foreman'', among other books. Theater critic for Soho Weekly News, Performing Arts Journal, London New Statesman. Gerry will be missed by friends and family all over the world. Memorial service to be announced.
